quote: Pride goes before destruction and a haughty spirit before a fall.
All anyone asks for is a chance to work with pride.
All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
And nothing to look backward to with pride, and nothing to look forward to with hope.
And the Devil did grin, for his darling sin is pride that apes humility.
Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
At every trifle take offense, that always shows great pride or little sense.
Atheism is the result of ignorance and pride; of strong sense and feeble reasons; of good eating and ill living.
Besides pride, loyalty, discipline, heart, and mind, confidence is the key to all the locks.
Pride goes before destruction and a haughty spirit before a fall.
All anyone asks for is a chance to work with pride.
All money means to me is a pride in accomplishment.
And nothing to look backward to with pride, and nothing to look forward to with hope.
And the Devil did grin, for his darling sin is pride that apes humility.
Anger is the enemy of non-violence and pride is a monster that swallows it up.
At every trifle take offense, that always shows great pride or little sense.
Atheism is the result of ignorance and pride; of strong sense and feeble reasons; of good eating and ill living.
Besides pride, loyalty, discipline, heart, and mind, confidence is the key to all the locks.
Generosity is giving more than you can, and pride is taking less than you need.
Happy is the soul that has something to look backward to with pride, and something to look forward to with hope.
I could easily forgive his pride, if he had not mortified mine.
Idleness and pride tax with a heavier hand than kings and governments.
If I had only one sermon to preach it would be a sermon against pride.
In general, pride is at the bottom of all great mistakes.
In general, pride is at the bottom of all great mistakes.
Intellectual pride inflicts itself upon everybody. Where it dwells there can be no other opinion in the house.
Is pride, the never-failing vice of fools.
It was pride that changed angels into devils; it is humility that makes men as angels.
It's a fine thing to rise above pride, but you must have pride in order to do so.
Jesus is the God whom we can approach without pride and before whom we can humble ourselves without despair.
Losers have tons of variety. Champions just take pride in learning to hit the same old boring winning shots.
Love, Arthur, is a poodle's chance of attaining the infinite, and personally I have my pride.
My family pride is something inconceivable. I can't help it. I was born sneering.
Nationalist pride, like other variants of pride, can be a substitute for self-respect.
Nothing is ever done beautifully which is done in rivalship: or nobly, which is done in pride.
One has occasionally to pocket one’s pride and readjust one’s ideas.
Poor nations are hungry, and rich nations are proud; and pride and hunger will ever be at variance.
Pride costs more than hunger, thirst and cold.
Pride defeats its own end, by bringing the man who seeks esteem and reverence into contempt.
Pride does not wish to owe and vanity does not wish to pay.
Pride in the case of a rich man is bad, but pride in the case of a poor man is worse.
Pride is an admission of weakness; it secretly fears all competition and dreads all rivals.
Pride is pleasure arising from a man's thinking too highly of himself.
Pride is seldom delicate; it will please itself with very mean advantages.
Pride is the master sin of the devil, and the devil is the father of lies.
Pride makes us artificial and humility makes us real.
Pride perceiving humility honorable, often borrows her cloak.
Pride that dines on vanity, sups on contempt.
Pride the first peer and president of hell.
Pride works frequently under a dense mask, and will often assume the garb of humility.
Quality is pride of workmanship.
Search well and be wise, nor believe that self-willed pride will ever be better than good counsel.
Swallow your pride occasionally, it's not fattening.
That which is given with pride and ostentation is rather an ambition than a bounty.
The charity that hastens to proclaim its good deeds, ceases to be charity, and is only pride and ostentation.
The English are predisposed to pride, the French to vanity.
The God of this world is riches, pleasure and pride.
The greatest pride, or the greatest despondency, is the greatest ignorance of one's self.
The infinitely little have a pride infinitely great.
The news is the one thing the networks can point to with pride. Everything else they do is crap and they know it.
The passions grafted on wounded pride are the most inveterate; they are green and vigorous in old age.
The pride of dying rich raises the loudest laugh in hell.
The rich swell up with pride, the poor from hunger.
The truest characters of ignorance are vanity and pride and arrogance.
There is much proud humility and humble pride in the world.
There is no cure for the pride of a virtuous nation but pure religion.
There is this paradox in pride - it makes some men ridiculous, but prevents others from becoming so.
Vanity is a mark of humility rather than of pride.
We are taxed twice as much by our idleness, three times as much by our pride and four times as much by our foolishness.
We rise in glory as we sink in pride.''
When we fail our pride supports us and when we succeed, it betrays us.
A family on the throne is an interesting idea. It brings down the pride of sovereignty to the level of petty life.
